Translation.Cause: The name of a private method does not start with Do.
Translation.Description: In order to make the code a bit clearer out convention is to prefix the names of private methods with Do.
Translation.Fix: Prepend the method name with Do.

Translation.Cause: The name of a public or protected method starts with Do.
Translation.Description: In order to make the code a bit clearer out convention is to prefix the names of private methods with Do.
Translation.Fix: Don't use Do with public or protected methods.

Translation.Cause: A call to one of the Smokey logging methods uses a string for the first argument.
Translation.Description: The Smokey logger is a hierarchical logger and uses the type of the first argument to decide whether to log or not.
Translation.Fix: The first argument should be "this", "true", or null cast to a type.
